noAuthorizationsYet: You don't have any authorizations for this resource type yet
authorizationDescription: Authorizations define access permissions for different resources. Create an authorization by selecting an owner, resource, and at least one permission.
authorizationLoadError: The list of authorizations could not be loaded.
authorizationCreatedSuccess: You have successfully created authorization {{ resourceId }}
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the following authorization:
createAuthorizationIntroduction: Grant an owner access to a resource with specific permissions. <2>Learn more</2>.
selectPermission: Select at least one permission. All available resource permissions can be found <2>here</2>.
pleaseEnterValidUsername: Please enter a valid username (only characters, numbers and _ ~ @ . + - and max 256 characters)
pleaseEnterValidGroupId: Please enter a valid Group ID (only characters, numbers and _ ~ @ . + - and max 256 characters)
permissionRequired: Please select at least one permission
pleaseEnterValidClientId: Please enter a valid Client ID (only characters, numbers and _ ~ @ . + - and max 256 characters)
pleaseEnterValidResourceId: Please enter a valid Resource ID (only characters, numbers and _ ~ @ . + - and max 256 characters or wildcard '*')
